data_table.description: The dataset provides basic information about participants' affection status, name of disorder, ancestry, gender. Version 2 release includes data of subjects diagnosed with e.g. Kabuki or Nager syndrome, or congenital disorders of gylcosylation (in addition to data of version 1 subjects diagnosed with e.g. congenital diaphragmatic hernia/autosomal dominant atrial-septal defect/or congenital neutropenia).

variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: Sequence Lab ID number, which is de-identified and unique

variable.name: CONDITION
variable.description: Name of disorder; presumed or confirmed.

variable.name: AFFECTION_STATUS
variable.description: Case - control status of the subject

variable.name: OMIM_ID
variable.description: Phenotype ID from Online Mendelian Inheritance in Man OMIM
